message.body: How was the show?
Haven't seen it yet. Just leaving Philly. Are you here?
Just got ear
We just missed each other. Hows tour?
It's going really well. Every show has been sold out.
I got back at 4am so I totally missed you last night. Sorry I missed you! When do you head out?
We're gone. In Durham, North Carolina.
Is everything ok? I feel like you're very cool with me.
What do you mean? Am I being too short?
Yea, I've felt a shift. If it was me, let me know.
Texting can do that. I'm sorry If I've come across as short. Definitely don't mean to
Ok, well I mean to be authentic when I say I care about you and your friendship.
Well thank you, I appreciate that. And I yours.
How was the show?
Not so great actually... But I learned a lot! Now I'm back in NYC visiting pat. :)
Why? What happened?
It was pretty esoteric even for someone in an experimental theatre training program... But there was a huge beautiful dog in it.
How's your heart?
Was it well received? And I'm ok. My heart is growing up, like everyone else I suppose. And how about yours?
Well it's a fairly well known and respected Irish theatre company so it was and it wasn't. What do you mean about tour heart growing up?
I'm learning how to create and preserve the image of my choice.
Hmmmm. Can you be more specific.......?
What image?
Sorry for the delayed response, I was driving the bus. I mean growing up and practicing things I want to be better at. Patience, kindness, honesty. That's where my heart is.
